resources.string: Choose which numberal is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

"Congratulations, the level 1 is completed!\n Do you know that the number 7 is the happiest number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 musical notes, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 days of Creation and much more ...\n Also, the number 7 is often the favorite number of people all around the world."
Choose which Roman digit is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
"Congratulations, the level 2 is completed!\n Do you know that in Roman numerals there is no digit zero?"
